reviews.customers_say: Customers love this cardigan's style, appreciating its scallop design and versatility for both casual and business wear. Customers like the color, particularly the true red shade, and find it comfortable and cozy.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True Navy
items.body: This is a cute sweater and for the strike through price its great. I was worried about the fabric being itchy, but its actually soft. Im not sure of the fit. I ordered my normal size and since Im going to wear it open, I think its a little big. The sleeves are long and are ok if I turn them up but then I can't see the scalloped detail. It's the perfect lenght for a lightweight sweater, but its not a bulky long sweater. More of a dressy sweater. It's big throught the shoulders to. It's fits nice to wear a blouse or a tank top under. The navy is a nice shade, not real dark. I think it looks alittle sloppy so I have reordered a M in the navy and red. When I get the next order, I'll decide on the correct size. I am 130lbs, 5'4" and a 36D. If I was wearing it buttoned up I think it would be perfect. I live in FL so this weight is perfect for my temps. Read more
items.author: Kim G.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEAUTIFUL!!
items.body: I absolutely LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this sweater!! So much that I ordeed 2 more in different colors! Everything about them spells quality! The scalloping is such a delicate touch, it fits true to size, the price is definitely a bargain, it is just the right thickness, the color is beautiful, it should be warm enogh for Michigan winters, fall and spring and I can't say enough good about them! I haven't washed them because I haven't worn them yet so I can't comment on washability or drying. I will wash inside out in a garmet bag and lay flat to dry. I do that with all my sweaters. You can't go wrong with this sweater and I am thrilled tht I got it on sale!! Read more
items.author: Colleen R. Wager

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute, stylish cardian
items.body: I fell in love with the scalloped edge detail on this cardigan. Perfect for work but also looks great with jeans. I ordered this in Black size Large. I am 5'10" and 175 lbs. This cardigan fits a little tighter in the arms but still acceptable. It's not baggy so it feels a little more tailored. I am able to button it with no issues. If you want a looser feel I would size up. It falls just below my waist so not too short for us tall girls. The fabric is a tight knit giving this a high quality, soft feel. The black color is. a true black. I would buy again. Read more
items.author: SG

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars If bought this style 4 times
items.body: Very happy, this is the 3rd color I purchased. Good fit, color and style. Read more
items.author: Linda F. Brown

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great cardigan with cute scalloped detail
items.body: This cardigan is exactly what I was looking for. The v neck line visually elongates the body and the scalloped edges add a beautiful detail to it. The material is perfect for Fall, it’s not too thin and not too thick. It’s true to size, so if you want an oversized fit, size up. I wanted it more tailored, so I bought my usual size. I wore it out of the bag after spraying it with wrinkle release and throwing it in the dryer on low for a minute. Great price and so cute that I had to got several colors! Read more
items.author: B Carter

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I Love these adorable well made sweaters.
items.body: These shrug/cropped/shorter sweaters are soooo nice. Way better than I expected! Fabric is so soft and not flimsy at all! I like that it is a bit heavier than it looked in many of the shopper’s photos…not clingy at all! I am only 5ft tall, so the length hits me at the upper hip area, and perfect for layering over a longer top…which I wanted. I got the red and green sweaters, the red is a true vibrant red and the green is a true Kelly green…both perfect! Now for size…I usually size up for clothing from Amazon, and I am glad I did on these. It does run a size smaller than my usual size, so I would size up, especially if you want to button it up. I plan to only wear it opened, so it depends on how you are going to wear it. But go by the measurement chart…and for me it was one size up. I might get more if they come out in more darker jewel colors…the price is great for the excellent quality. Oh ya, the scalloped edges are a fashion plus! Get these, especially if you like a shorter sweater. The photos helped! Read more
items.author: Andrea

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater
items.body: Lightweight. Fits very true to size. A very pretty sweater that is versatile. Loved the true red. Read more
items.author: Lisa S.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Looks good in pics but not tailored
items.body: Not as tailored as I thought. Cheap material, but rich color. Does look great in pictures. Read more
items.author: Penny A. Pasque

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Apricot, Black, Mocha, Coffee, Fox, Light Blue, Red, Navy, Khaki, White, Yellow, Light Pink, Oatmeal Grey, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
